name: zenith

zenith noun [C usually singular]
(HIGHEST POINT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
astronomy
  specialized the highest point reached by a heavenly body (= any object existing in space, especially a planet, or the sun) as it travels around, or appears to travel around, another body: The summer sun was at its zenith in a cloudless sky. The sun is well past its zenith when we cross paths with a mini-flotilla.
astronomy
  specialized the point in the sky directly above you: The centre of the map is the zenith (straight overhead). A pall of cloud muffled the whole expanse of sky from zenith to horizon.

zenith noun [C usually singular]
(MOST SUCCESSFUL POINT)
